syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Economics 9708

content.description: meaning of supply-side policy, in terms of its effect on LRAS curves
objectives of supply-side policy: increasing productivity and productive capacity
tools of supply-side policy, for example training, infrastructure development, support for technological improvement
AD/AS analysis of the impact of supply-side policy on the equilibrium national income and the level of real output, the price level and employment
